Completely erases the contents of existing local translation files.
는 Google Sheets를 단일 진실 공급원(Single Source: is a command for when using Google Sheets as a Single Source of Truth. It completely replaces local translation files with Sheets data.
In most cases, using i18n-download is safer.
되돌릴 수 없음 (Git 미사용 시): Cannot be undone (if Git is not used)
Back up local translation files to another location before running the command.
로컬 변경사항이 없음을 확신: Confident that there are no local changes
로컬 파일이 손상되었거나 문제가 있어서 Sheets의 깨끗한 버전으로 다: When local files are corrupted or have issues and you want to start fresh with a clean version from Sheets
로컬에서 번역을 직접 수정하지 않고, Sheets에서만 번역을 관리하는: When you don't modify translations locally and only manage translations in Sheets
명령 실행 전에 현재 상태를 Git에 커밋하세요. 문제가 생기면 되돌릴: Commit the current state to Git before running the command. You can revert if problems occur.
모든 번역 작업이 Google Sheets에서만 이루어지고, 로컬 파일은: When all translation work is done only in Google Sheets and local files are simply copies of Sheets
안전한 증분 다운로드 방식 알아보기: Learn about safe incremental download method
이 명령어는 로컬 번역 파일을 Google Sheets의 데이터로 완전히: This command completely overwrites local translation files with Google Sheets data. All translations that only exist locally will be deleted. Generally, using i18n-download is safer.
자동화된 배포 파이프라인에서 Sheets로부터 항상 최신 번역을 가져오는: Can be used in automated deployment pipelines to always fetch the latest translations from Sheets.
팀에서 Google Sheets를 단일 진실 공급원으로 사용하기로 명확히: Only use when your team has clearly agreed to use Google Sheets as a Single Source of Truth.
Reads all translations from Google Sheets.
Verify that Google Sheets content is correct before downloading.
Google Sheets의 데이터로 로컬 번역을 완전히 덮어씁니다: Completely overwrites local translations with Google Sheets data
Writes Sheets translations to local files. No merging.
